title: BEST SUPERHERO MOVIE
review: Once upon a time i had imagine.i want to see some MARVEL HEROES in the same movie.Finally my imagine is real now.Thanks MARVEL.(There was an idea bring together remarkable people.So we needed them.They could fight the battles that we never could)

title: WORST EVER MOVIE
review: I hate BATMAN Becouse of this movie.Ben Affleck is the worst batman ever.If you want to better superhero movie you can watch AVENGERS.MARVEL FIGHTS DC.I think Zack Snyder must be retired.

title: ENDLESS THANKS TO MARVEL AND RUSSO BROTHERS
review: It's mind blowing,amazing,thrilling movie.Specially i liked Thanos.Thank you MARVEL and Russo Brothers.I cant wait Part 2.

movie_title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
title: CHRISTIAN BALE MUST COME BACK
review: Everybody knows Batman doesn't kill people.But Snyder's Batman kills people.It's a joke? I don't like Ben Affleck's acting.Same time wish Bryan Cranston playing Lex Luthor.
